_header: Then the soul is Jesu loving
Subjects: songs; Christ, love toward; sermons, verse in
_description: Song of the soul afire with love of Jesus Christ, in a sermon on Luke XVI, ‘Redde racionem villicacionis tue luce’ (beg. f. 101) — eight rhyming phrases

OxfUni97.Transcription:
Thanne þe soule is ihesu louyngon ihesu þenkyngIhesu
                    desyryngoonly in coueytyngof hym dwellyngTo him syngyngeOf
                    him brennyngIn him restyng
